basics.label: Business Development Manager
basics.summary: With 11 years of diverse managerial and marketing experience penetrating in domestic and international markets including Manufacturing, Engineering, Food and IT, I have honed my communication and marketing research abilities to gauge demand for products and explore new clients. Having managed several big projects, I have learnt to maintain equanimity under pressure and achieve goals both as a cross functional team member and individual contributor.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed big projects, developed new clients, saved $20 million for Reliance Industries in burner designs and oversaw all aspects of new plant development at Rajkot.
highlights: Closed $200 million deal with Reliance Industries
Negotiated and saved 15% on purchase cost of new welding machineries
Recognized as best employee of the month for sales performance in 2015
Developed active approach in solving client and sales issues
Grew and expanded market for highly technical and heavy equipment's in Indian market
Headed new sales development team in various industries
Performed market research SWOT analysis for Amul Products

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversaw product life cycle from design to sales of 2.5HP Engine in Asian and Gulf markets, improved engine efficiency and reduced rejections.

certificates.name: Certificate - Introduction to Python for Data Science
